aravan Court was a large courtyard that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Caravan Court was located in the northeast section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward. The northern side of the courtyard bordered the Trades Ward. Streets connecting with Caravan Court included Quarrels Flight, Sahtyras Lane, Ruids Stroll, the Rising Ride, Belzers Walk, and Caravan Street.
The court was a popular spot for old men to gather and watch others perform hard labor and sweat. Many brought their own stools or crates for the occasion.
